thread.title: BRIEF-Air Products Increases Supply Capacity Of Its Gulf Coast Hydrogen Pipeline Supply Network

title: BRIEF-Air Products Increases Supply Capacity Of Its Gulf Coast Hydrogen Pipeline Supply Network

organizations.name: hydrogen pipeline supply network reuters staff

text:
April 2, 2018 / 4:59 PM / Updated 37 minutes ago BRIEF-Air Products Increases Supply Capacity Of Its Gulf Coast Hydrogen Pipeline Supply Network Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - Air Products and Chemicals Inc: 
* AIR PRODUCTS SAYS INCREASED SUPPLY CAPACITY OF ITS GULF COAST HYDROGEN PIPELINE SUPPLY NETWORK BY APPROXIMATELY 40 MILLION STANDARD CUBIC FEET PER DAY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
